meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Giants and Jets Both Win In Their Season-Openers Tiki Barber rushed for 144 yards and two touchdowns and the rookie Ron Dayne added another touchdown as the Giants beat the Arizona Cardinals, 21-16, at the Meadowlands. For the Jets, Curtis Martin led the way to a 20-16 victory over the Green Bay Packers at Lambeau Field, running for 110 yards and one touchdown.
Shake-Up for Lebanon A former prime minister dealt a blow to Lebanon's Syrian-picked government in final parliamentary voting, early results showed, altering the political status quo.

Giants and Jets Both Win In Their Season-Openers Tiki Barber rushed for 144 yards and two touchdowns and the rookie Ron Dayne added another touchdown as the Giants beat the Arizona Cardinals, 21-16, at the Meadowlands. For the Jets, Curtis Martin led the way to a 20-16 victory over the Green Bay Packers at Lambeau Field, running for 110 yards and one touchdown.
Shake-Up for Lebanon A former prime minister dealt a blow to Lebanon's Syrian-picked government in final parliamentary voting, early results showed, altering the political status quo.
Tire Problems in 1978 After the last major recall of Firestone tires, in 1978, tighter standards were proposed, to no avail. Now many of the same problems have arisen again.
